author: Al Jazeera
title: UK turns to private sector to boost virus testing capacity
description: A group of private pharmaceutical companies and Cambridge University will produce 30,000 tests a day, said officials.
content:
Millions of coronavirus tests will be distributed in the United Kingdom in the coming months, officials have pledged, following criticism that the government has moved too slowly.
After England's chief medical officer conceded on Tuesday that there were less… [+3391 chars]
